content: To connect the app, scan the QR code or manually enter your secret key <1>{{ secretKey }}</1>, and then enter a 6-digit code from your app in the field below.

comment.text: The translation key SetAppInstallDescription is used to provide instructions on how to connect an app, including scanning a QR code or manually entering a secret key. This text appears in a UI element that prompts users to complete this step, likely a dialog or confirmation page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ŸÑŸÑÿ±ÿ®ÿ∑ ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇ" is a literal translation of "To connect the app". A more natural phrasing might be "ŸÑÿ±ÿ®ÿ∑ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇ" or "ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ™ÿµÿßŸÑ ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ŸÑÿ±ÿ®ÿ∑ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "ÿ±ŸÖÿ≤" is used repeatedly. While technically correct for "code/key", it can be slightly repetitive and less natural. Considering variations could improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Perhaps alternate with 'ŸÖŸÅÿ™ÿßÿ≠' (key) for some instances to vary the language.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of `<1>{{ secretKey }}</1>` seems correct, aligning with the English original. However, verify the system handles the tags appropriately.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, verify tag rendering

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'manual' is translated as 'manual olaraq'. While understandable, it's more natural to use a more appropriate Azerbaijani equivalent like '√ºz√ºn√ºzl…ô' or 'b…ôd…ôn…ôn'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: T…ôtbiq…ô qo≈üulmaq √º√ß√ºn QR kodu skan edin v…ô ya √∂z√ºn√ºzl…ô gizli a√ßarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± <1>{{ secretKey }}</1>, daha sonra is…ô a≈üaƒüƒ±dakƒ± xanada t…ôtbiqd…ôn …ôld…ô etdiyiz 6 r…ôq…ômli kodu daxil edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The brackets `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent with typical Azerbaijani punctuation and style. It would be better to remove them unless they serve a very specific purpose (which isn't clear).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: T…ôtbiq…ô qo≈üulmaq √º√ß√ºn QR kodu skan edin v…ô ya √∂z√ºn√ºzl…ô gizli a√ßarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± {{ secretKey }}, daha sonra is…ô a≈üaƒüƒ±dakƒ± xanada t…ôtbiqd…ôn …ôld…ô etdiyiz 6 r…ôq…ômli kodu daxil edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The XML tag `<1>` and `</1>` are present in both the English and German translations, which is unusual and may not be intended. They don't contribute to the meaning and could be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the XML tags `<1>` and `</1>` from the German translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The XML tags `<1>` are not standard and appear misplaced. They are likely intended to mark the secretKey placeholder but the structure is incorrect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the XML tags are correctly formatted for the platform they are intended for.  A common pattern is to use a more standardized format like `<secretKey>{{ secretKey }}</secretKey>` or an equivalent. Or remove if not needed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The XML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are present in both the English and Finnish translations. While they are technically correct for representing the secretKey placeholder, their presence disrupts the natural flow of the Finnish text. They are not a standard part of the Finnish sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the XML tags from the Finnish translation unless they are strictly required for technical processing. The sentence should read: 'Jos haluat yhdist√§√§ sovelluksen, skannaa QR-koodi tai kirjoita salainen avaimesi {{ secretKey }} manuaalisesti ja kirjoita sitten 6-numeroinen koodi sovelluksestasi alla olevaan kentt√§√§n.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To connect the app" is translated as "’Ä’°’æ’•’¨’æ’°’Æ’® ’¥’´’°÷Å’∂’•’¨’∏÷Ç ’∞’°’¥’°÷Ä", which is grammatically correct but a bit literal. A more natural phrasing might be "’Ä’°’æ’•’¨’æ’°’Æ’® ’¥’´’°÷Å’∂’•’¨’∏÷Ç ’∞’°’¥’°÷Ä" or something similar depending on the context and desired tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing for 'To connect the app', like '’Ä’°’æ’•’¨’æ’°’Æ’´ ’¥’´’°÷Å’∏÷Ç’¥’®' or a more idiomatic equivalent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'secret key' is translated as '’£’°’≤’ø’∂’´ ’¢’°’∂’°’¨’´’∂'. While technically correct, a more common and perhaps clearer translation in this context might be '’£’°’≤’ø’∂’´ ’£’´÷Ä÷Ñ' or something that conveys the key's purpose more explicitly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '’£’°’≤’ø’∂’´ ’£’´÷Ä÷Ñ' or a similar phrase that better conveys the meaning of 'secret key' in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` appears to be an incorrect tag identifier and potentially represents a misunderstanding of the original format. It should match the original HTML tag, which is likely `<1>`. The translation preserves this incorrect format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the HTML tag structure exactly matches the English version, likely `<1>{{ secretKey }}</1>`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "‡∫™‡∫≥‡∫•‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡ªÄ‡∫ä‡∫∑‡ªà‡∫≠‡∫°‡∫ï‡ªç‡ªà‡ªÅ‡∫≠‡∫ö" is a somewhat literal translation of "To connect the app." A more natural Lao phrasing might be something like "‡ªÄ‡∫û‡∫∑‡ªà‡∫≠‡ªÄ‡∫ä‡∫∑‡ªà‡∫≠‡∫°‡∫ï‡ªç‡ªà‡ªÅ‡∫≠‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Ø" or "‡∫™‡∫≥‡∫•‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡ªÄ‡∫ä‡∫∑‡ªà‡∫≠‡∫°‡∫ï‡ªç‡ªà‡∫Å‡∫±‡∫ö‡ªÅ‡∫≠‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Ø".

‚Äú‡ªÉ‡∫™‡ªà‡∫•‡∫∞‡∫´‡∫±‡∫î‡∫•‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Ç‡∫≠‡∫á‡∫ó‡ªà‡∫≤‡∫ô‚Äù could be interpreted as ‚Äúenter your secret code‚Äù. A more accurate translation would be ‚Äú‡∫õ‡ªâ‡∫≠‡∫ô‡∫•‡∫∞‡∫´‡∫±‡∫î‡∫•‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Ç‡∫≠‡∫á‡∫ó‡ªà‡∫≤‡∫ô‚Äù or ‚Äú‡ªÉ‡∫™‡ªà‡∫•‡∫∞‡∫´‡∫±‡∫î‡∫•‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫Ç‡∫≠‡∫á‡∫ó‡ªà‡∫≤‡∫ô‚Äù.
The HTML tags `<1>{{ secretKey }}</1>` appear to be correctly placed, but their meaning might need to be verified to ensure that the Lao text appropriately renders this variable substitution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Confirm correct rendering and variable substitution within the Lao text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "geheime code" is a literal translation of "secret key" but might be better translated to something like "geheime sleutel" or "verbindingscode" for better clarity and naturalness in Dutch. "Code" is also used for "key" which can be confusing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'geheime sleutel' or 'verbindingscode' instead of 'geheime code' to improve clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "fornecido pela sua app" (provided by your app) isn't the most natural way to express "from your app" in this context. It sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more natural phrasing like "da sua app" or "do seu aplicativo".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'c√¢mpul aflat dedesubt' is a bit awkward. It literally translates to 'the field located below'. A more natural phrasing would be '√Æn c√¢mpul de mai jos' or '√Æn c√¢mpul de jos'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a conecta aplica»õia, scana»õi codul QR sau introduce»õi manual cheia secretƒÉ <1>{{ secretKey }}</1>, »ôi apoi introduce»õi codul din 6 cifre din aplica»õia √Æn c√¢mpul de mai jos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "‡∂ª‡∑Ñ‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∂∫‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂ª" (rahas yatura) literally translates to "secret key" which is correct, but a more natural phrasing in Sinhala for this context might be "‡∂ú‡∑ù‡∂¥‡∂±‡∑ì‡∂∫ ‡∂∫‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂ª" (gopanaya yatura) or simply "‡∂∫‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂ª" (yatura).
The character ëá¶ (Unicode character U+10A02) is an archaic Sinhala number, not a standard one, and will appear incorrect to a Sinhala speaker.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace ëá¶ with the number 6. The correct phrase should be '‡∂Ö‡∂Ç‡∂ö (6) ‡∂ö ‡∂ö‡∑ö‡∂≠‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '‡∂ö‡∑ö‡∂≠‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂∫‡∑ú‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±' (keyathayak yodanna) is a bit clunky.  A more natural way to say 'enter a code' would be '‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±' (athulatha kanna).

The English phrase 'secret key' is translated as 'tajni kljuƒç'. While technically correct, 'tajni kljuƒç' can sound slightly unnatural in this context. A more natural translation might be 'kljuƒç' or 'siguran kljuƒç'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste povezali aplikaciju, skenirajte QR kod ili ruƒçno unesite svoj kljuƒç <1>{{ secretKey }}</1>, a zatim unesite ≈°estocifreni kod iz aplikacije u polje ispod.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to connect the app" is not accurately translated. "Uygulamayƒ± baƒülamak" is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be "Uygulamayƒ± e≈üle≈ütirmek" or "Uygulamayƒ± ili≈ükilendirmek".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uygulamayƒ± e≈üle≈ütirmek i√ßin QR kodunu tarayƒ±n veya gizli anahtarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± <1>{{ secretKey }}</1> manuel olarak girin ve ardƒ±ndan uygulamanƒ±zdan 6 haneli bir kodu a≈üaƒüƒ±daki alana girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "m√£ kh√≥a b√≠ m·∫≠t" is a literal translation of "secret key" and might sound unnatural in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be something like "kh√≥a b√≠ m·∫≠t" or "m√£ b√≠ m·∫≠t".
